segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, completely absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense that she doesn't notice the water spilling over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost mesmerizing, the way she polishes that plate without a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel surprised that she hasn't noticed the puddle forming at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water flows steadily, contrasting sharply with her calm demeanor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s like watching a ticking time bomb; something will break soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her knee-length dress sways gently as she moves, unaware of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR
